article_node.title: Why I Did Pushups on Camera To Launch a Wellness Challenge
article_node.summary: The article discusses the importance of leadership in fostering engagement, particularly in a wellness initiative. The author shares a personal experience of overcoming discomfort by recording a video of themselves doing pushups, which sparked participation among team members and created a supportive environment. It emphasizes that effective leadership often requires leading by example and being willing to be vulnerable, rather than simply relying on enthusiasm to motivate others.
